tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RoboticEquipmentMaintenance (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_schedule TEXT,
    service_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robot_equipment(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_id INT,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceHistory (
  service_id UUID,
  equipment_id UUID,
  service_date DATE,
  service_type VARCHAR,
  service_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_equipment (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
   model_number VARCHAR(50),
   status ENUM('Active', 'Inactive'),
   maintenance_schedule DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
   maintenance_description TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES robotic_equipment(id)
);

CREATE TABLE assigned_maintenance (
   assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   record_id INT,
   engineer_id INT,
   assignment_date DATE,
   completion_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES maintenance_history(record_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (engineer_id) REFERENCES service_engineers(engineer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts_log (
   alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   record_id INT,
   alert_type VARCHAR(50),
   alert_date DATETIME,
   alert_message TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES maintenance_history(record_id)
);
